result.title: Graphs Contest #1
result.content:
I've prepared a graph contest for you. I hope you'll apreciate it :)

I tried not to be too cruel. If someone really wants to have a two weeks challenge, you will enjoy solving problem TOURISM from 21 edition of Polish OI.

Good luck! :)

I didnt know that problem B is a much harder version of one problem from Codeforces. If you know that problem, try solving a harder version without reading Swistakk's improved solution
